text: Pran Nevile (October 22, 1922 â€“ October 11, 2018) was an Indian author. His works focused on Indian Art, Indian Culture and Indian History. He was best known for the 1992 book, Lahore - A Sentimental Journey. He was an authority on pre-1947 Lahore and Nautch. Nevile was born in Lahore. Nevile died on October 11, 2018 in New Delhi at the age of 95. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:1922 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Indian writers
title: Pran Nevile
